verses.roman:
sei tinera aṁśī paravyoma-nārāyaṇa
teṅha tomāra vilāsa, tumi mūla-nārāyaṇa

synonyms: sei—these; tinera—of the three; aṁśī—source; para-vyoma—in the spiritual sky; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa; teṅha—He; tomāra—Your; vilāsa—pastime expansion; tumi—You; mūla—original; nārāyaṇa—Nārāyaṇa.
translation: "The source of these three features is the Nārāyaṇa in the spiritual sky. He is Your vilāsa expansion. Therefore You are the ultimate Nārāyaṇa."
